alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Clinton; Elk (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:18PM EDT until August 12 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cameron County in north central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... East central Elk County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cameron, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cameron, Keating, Renovo, South Renovo, Westport, Tamarack, Stevenson Dam, Kettle Creek State Park, Hicks Run and Driftwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this severe thunderstorm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.
